Stratigraphic matrix for samples ordered

Construc the stratigraphic matrix used in fonction AgeS_Computation and AgeC14_Computation for samples that are all ordered by increasing oder.

SC_Ordered(Nb_sample)

Arguments

Nb_sample

interger: the sample number.

Value

Stratigraphic matrix where each sample are ordered by incresing order This matrix can be intergrate in AgeS_Computation function. We refer to detail on AgeS_Computation for more information concerning this matrix.

See also

AgeS_Computation, SC_Matrix

Examples

# compute the stratigraphic matrix for 3 samples such that the first sample is younger
# than the second, and the second is younger than the third
(SC=SC_Ordered(Nb_sample=3))
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3]
#> [1,]    1    1    1
#> [2,]    0    1    1
#> [3,]    0    0    1
#> [4,]    0    0    0
